unnormalised: Okay, folks, hold your chai because this piping hot gossip just landed! Sources say Alia Bhatt and Vijay Deverakonda were spotted having a "discreet" dinner at Wasabi by Morimoto at the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel last Tuesday. A blurry Instagram story (posted at exactly 23:57 hrs!) seemed to show them laughing together. Is it just a friendly hangout or something *more* brewing?
